headline: Energy Sector Faces 26% Earnings Drop as Q2 Season Begins
summary: Wall Street slashed EPS forecasts for oil and gas firms by nearly 19%, with sector earnings now expected to fall 25.6% year-over-year.

headline: Duke Energy’s (DUK) Subsidiary Eyes More Revenues in South Carolina
summary: Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) is one of the 10 best defensive stocks to buy in a volatile market. On July 1, the company’s subsidiary, Duke Energy Carolinas, filed a request for a 7.7% rate increase in South Carolina. If approved, the new power rates will come into effect early next year. The proposed rate increase […]

headline: Investors Heavily Search Duke Energy Corporation (DUK): Here is What You Need to Know
summary: Duke Energy (DUK) has been one of the stocks most watched by Zacks.com users lately. So, it is worth exploring what lies ahead for the stock.

headline: Duke Energy to Announce Second Quarter Financial Results on Aug 5
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. - Duke Energy will post its second-quarter 2025 financial results at 7 a.m. ET on Tuesday, Aug. 5, on the company's website at duke-energy.com/investors.An earnings conference call...
